name: Oh My Corn...!
description:
Did you really think  microwaves work with waves? Oh dear, you were wrong all this time. The true reason are FAIRIES! Yes, you've never saw them but they are real, it's just that it is pretty hard to see them, but you better watch your microwave from now on or they will eat your food, specially your popcorn… They LOVE eating popcorn!

This is a multiplayer versus game in which you play with these fairies and you have to eat more popcorn than anyone else. Be careful with burnt popcorn, humans and watch your weight! The winner is whoever win 3 rounds.

______________________

This game was made in 48 hours for the last Global Game Jam, in the Málaga Jam, the biggest game jam of all time in Spain.
